snippet.title: Amiga 500 Longplay [313] Demon Blue
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: SCHLAUCHI

From MobyGames:
'In the game, you are a small shaggy blue demon finding himself in a dungeon full of fallen angels, gargoyles, wasps, etc. So you have to run and jump avoiding them, collecting gems, blood drops, energy vials, and some sort of friend-demons such as eyes and tongues. On each level you have to find the keys to open a door to a magical cauldron guarded by a beautiful elf.'

Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
